Oooh, such a deep story. So rare for hentai in this site. Agree, its not ntr at all, but still leaving a mixed feeling in the early pages. 

So, are we recommending ntr stories now? Try hinata ntrism, need better? Zutto suki datta. Tachibana-san-chi no Dansei Jijou By MTSP (3/4 short series) , koibito ja nai By ss brain (2 short series),  matsuri By mashira dou (2 short stories). Good luck feeling the brick hitting

All the people saying this is NTR really haven't witnessed the true horror and gut wrenching pain of an actual NTR. The girl's childhood friend never really showed interest in her and clearly was fine with her leaving the club and didn't care about what she felt about him based on his response so he's not being cucked. But the guy who's been spending time with her, listening to her, being there for her, and wants to see her happy, shows how much he loves her and truly cares about her and all long shes had these feelings for him too. This isn't NTR, it isnt in the slightest and is pure vanilla through and through. If y'all want a good example of an NTR  read One Time Gal, bet y'all confused people thinking this is NTR will probably say that dumpster fire is vanilla.
Oof, shut made me cry and nut at the same time, Oof.
